Sure I think subscribe and save a lot of people do and fwiw I think it's great. I use it for these and the range and trust in delivery.

Discovery is horrible. The value prop now sits solely in the flywheel of availability and service (time to deliver). If you want to find and trust something without brand intent already but just item it's just sponsor list after sponsor list.

....now Amazon has a ad rev / total rev % of around 10%. 

Let that sink in for a way to destroy the user experience of the platform for profit. 

Amazon has done so well but ^ this is the thing that is the start of them losing market share today or tomorrow.

You can submit a proposal here: https://nouns.build/dao/base/0x8de71d80ee2c4700bc9d4f8031a2504ca93f7088/752?tab=activity
